title: Codepen.io
description: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. Build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases to learn and debug, and find inspiration.

title: Glitch.me
description: Create your next web project in your browser with no setup and we'll instantly deploy it.

title: JSFiddle.net
description: JSFiddle is an online IDE which is designed to allow users to edit and run HTML, JavaScript, and CSS code on a single page. Its interface is minimalist and split into four main frames, which correspond to editable HTML, JavaScript and CSS fields and a result field which displays the user's project after it is run.

title: SVGOMG
description: SVGOMG is SVGO's Missing GUI, aiming to expose the majority, if not all the configuration options of SVGO.

title: RealFaviconGenerator
description: With so many platforms and icons, it's hard to know exactly what you should do. What are the dimensions of favicon.ico? How many Touch icons do I need? RealFaviconGenerator did the reseach and testing for you.

title: Adobe Color
description: Color is a web app and creative community where you and other artists can create and share color themes and inspiration. Save themes to your Adobe Creative Cloud Libraries to use in your favorite desktop and mobile apps, like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Photoshop Sketch.

title: Coolors
description: The super fast color schemes generator! Create the perfect palette or get inspired by thousands of beautiful color schemes.

title: Google Fonts
description: Google Fonts makes it easy to bring personality and performance to your websites and products. Our robust catalog of open-source fonts and icons, makes it easy to integrate expressive type and icons seamlessly—no matter where you are in the world.

title: Modular Scale
description: First introduced at Build 2010 by Tim Brown, this site was built as a tool to help web designers size their type in a more meaningful way. The site re-launched at AEA Atlanta 2015 through a collaboration between Tim Brown and Scott Kellum.

title: Type-Scale
description: A Visual Type Scale Calculator

title: unDraw
description: Open-source illustrations for any idea you can imagine and create. A constantly updated design project with beautiful SVG images that you can use completely free and without attribution.

title: The Noun Project
description: Noun Project is building a global visual language that unites us — a language that allows quick and easy communication no matter who you are or where you are.

title: Unsplash
description: Over 2 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the world’s most generous community of photographers.

title: Figma
description: Figma connects everyone in the design process so teams can deliver better products, faster.

title: unavatar
description: Get a unified user avatar from multiple providers.

title: {JSON} Placeholder
description: JSONPlaceholder is a free online REST API that you can use whenever you need some fake data. It can be in a README on GitHub, for a demo on CodeSandbox, in code examples on Stack Overflow, ...or simply to test things locally.

title: Diffchecker
description: Diffchecker will compare text to find the difference between two text files. Just paste your files and click Find Difference.

title: Remix Icon
description: Remix Icon is a set of open-source neutral-style system symbols elaborately crafted for designers and developers. All of the icons are free for both personal and commercial use.

title: iconmonstr
description: iconmonstr - free, monstrously big and continuously growing source of simple icons run by one creator

title: Nu HTML Checker
description: This tool is an ongoing experiment in better HTML checking, and its behavior remains subject to change.

title: fontplop
description: FontPlop is an OSX/macOS application which takes ttf and otf files and outputs a webfont bundle: woff2, woff, ttf/otf. It is the simpler, faster, free successor to FontPrep, which is no longer maintained
